hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT A.BANKID, D.BANKDIRNAME, D.BANKNAME, A.RANGEID, B.DISPLAYID AS CALLOUTCONFID, C.DESCRIPTION AS CALLOUTTYPE FROM ARBANKCALLOUTS A, ARCALLOUTSCONFIG B, ARCALLOUTS C, ARBANKINFO D WHERE A.CONFID = B.CONFID AND A.CALLOUTID = C.CALLOUTID AND A.BANKID = D.BANKID AND A.BANKID IN (SELECT BANKID FROM ARBANKINFO WHERE BANKDIRNAME = :bankdirname)

SELECT A.BANKID, A.BANKNAME, A.BANKDIRNAME, B.RANGEID, C.GROUPNAME FROM ARBANKINFO A, ARBANKRAGROUP B, ARRAGROUP C WHERE A.BANKID=B.BANKID AND B.GROUPID = C.GROUPID AND A.BANKID IN (SELECT BANKID FROM ARBANKINFO WHERE BANKDIRNAME = :bankdirname)

SELECT A.BANKID, A.BANKNAME, A.BANKDIRNAME, B.RANGEID, C.FOLDERID, C.FOLDER AS CAPFOLDER, D.LOCALE FROM ARBANKINFO A, ARDEVICE B, ARFOLDER C, ARLOCALE D WHERE A.BANKID=B.BANKID AND B.FOLDERID = C.FOLDERID AND B.LOCALEID = D.LOCALEID AND A.BANKID IN (SELECT BANKID FROM ARBANKINFO WHERE BANKDIRNAME = :bankdirname)

SELECT BANKID, BANKNAME,BANKDIRNAME, RANGEID, LOCALE, CONTENTNAME, CASE WHEN CCID = 3 THEN 'CONTACTUS' WHEN CCID = 4 THEN 'FAQ' WHEN CCID = 5 THEN 'TNC' WHEN CCID = 7 THEN 'ISSUERLOGO' WHEN CCID = 8 THEN 'BRANDLOGO' END AS CONTENTCATEGORY FROM (SELECT C.BANKID, C.BANKNAME, C.BANKDIRNAME, A.RANGEID, D.LOCALE, B.CONTENTNAME, A.CONTENTCATEGORYID AS CCID FROM ARBANKCONTENT A, ARUPLOADCONTENT B, ARBANKINFO C, ARLOCALE D WHERE A.BANKID = C.BANKID AND A.LOCALEID = D.LOCALEID AND A.CONTENTID = B.CONTENTID AND C.BANKID IN (SELECT BANKID FROM ARBANKINFO WHERE BANKDIRNAME = :bankdirname))
